## Move type

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

An object describing a player's move, which can be a tile placement, tile movement, or pass.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Move = TilePlacement | TileMovement | Pass;
```
**References:** [TilePlacement](./hive-lib.tileplacement.md)<!-- -->, [TileMovement](./hive-lib.tilemovement.md)<!-- -->, [Pass](./hive-lib.pass.md)
